metadata.title: The Last Station
metadata.description: Isolated Arctic research station horror where survival depends on maintaining sanity while uncovering terrible truths.
metadata.author: Bytebound Chronicles Team

storm.description: Howling blizzard outside affects morale and temperature

power_outage.description: Station systems offline, emergency power only

isolation.description: Crushing loneliness of the Arctic wasteland

beats.title: Emergency Landing
beats.description: Your supply helicopter is forced down by the worsening storm.

narrativeGuidance.openingText: The helicopter's engines die as snow swirls around the Arctic research station. Static crackles from your radioâ€”no response from the team inside. The building stands dark against the white expanse, emergency lights flickering weakly through frosted windows.

dynamicElements.highFear: Your hands shake uncontrollably as you approach the station, every shadow seeming to move with malevolent intent.
dynamicElements.lowSanity: The wind sounds almost like whispers, calling your name through the howling storm.
dynamicElements.storm: The blizzard intensifies, making visibility near zero and each step a struggle.

moodProgression: Dawning horror at what you discover

quickActions.label: Try the radio again
quickActions.description: Attempt to contact the research team or outside help

quickActions.label: Head to the main entrance
quickActions.description: Go directly to the station's front door

objectives.description: Get inside before the storm worsens
Determine what happened to the research team

hiddenTriggers.narrative: Your fingers are going numb, and your breath fogs heavily in the air. You need to get warm soon.

beats.title: Empty Halls
beats.description: Inside the station, silence and abandonment tell a disturbing story.

narrativeGuidance.openingText: The station's interior is cold and still. Emergency lighting casts long shadows down empty corridors. Personal belongings are scattered aboutâ€”coffee cups half-full, computers still running, but no sign of the six-person research team.

dynamicElements.highFear: Every creak of the building makes you jump. The shadows seem to move when you're not looking directly at them.
dynamicElements.lowSanity: You start hearing voices in the ventilation system, conversations that couldn't possibly be there.
dynamicElements.power_outage: Without main power, the station feels more like a tomb than a shelter.

quickActions.label: Check the computer logs
quickActions.description: Read the research team's final entries

quickActions.label: Search the living quarters
quickActions.description: Look through the team's personal spaces

quickActions.label: Follow the scratching sounds
quickActions.description: Investigate the noise coming from the walls

encounters.description: You glimpse a figure in a lab coat moving between the shadows, but when you look directly, nothing is there.

skillChecks.successText: You steel yourself and read through the increasingly disturbing log entries, learning valuable information about what happened.
skillChecks.failureText: The content of the logs is too disturbing. You can only skim the surface before your mind rejects what you're reading.

criticalFailure.text: The logs reveal horrors that shatter your perception of reality. You slam the computer shut, but the images are burned into your mind.

hiddenTriggers.description: Research notes mention sealed basement levels
hiddenTriggers.narrative: The research notes reference a restricted basement level that wasn't on any station blueprints you saw.
The isolation and stress are getting to you. You're starting to see and hear things that might not be there.

beats.title: What Lies Beneath
beats.description: The hidden basement levels reveal the true horror.

narrativeGuidance.openingText: The basement levels weren't on any station blueprints you saw. Your flashlight cuts through absolute darkness, revealing makeshift walls and hastily installed containment equipment. The air tastes metallic.

dynamicElements.lowSanity: The walls seem to pulse with a life of their own. Your flashlight beam wavers as your hands shake uncontrollably.
dynamicElements.highFear: Every shadow could hide something monstrous. Your heart pounds so loudly you're sure whatever lurks here can hear it.

quickActions.label: Read the warning signs on the walls
Follow the breathing sounds
quickActions.description: Move toward the wet, labored breathing

quickActions.label: Get out of here immediately
quickActions.description: Flee back to the upper levels

encounters.description: Your light illuminates something that shouldn't existâ€”a mass of pale flesh and too many eyes, wearing the torn remains of a research team jacket. It turns toward you with predatory intelligence.

characters.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
characters.description: Team leader whose voice echoes through static recordings

final_log.text: [STATIC] Day 15... the specimen has... changed. We thought we could contain it, study it. God forgive us. If anyone finds this, don't go into the basement. Seal this place. Let it die with us.

earlier_log.text: The ice core samples contained something... organic. Preserved for millennia. It's responding to warmth, to our presence. Marcus thinks we should report this, but the implications...

characters.name: Dr. Marcus Webb
characters.description: A team member whose presence lingers in the station

warning_message.text: You shouldn't have come here. We tried to stop it, but it was too late. The ice... it was never just ice.

endings.title: The Ultimate Sacrifice
endings.description: You destroy the station to contain the threat
endings.narrative: The explosion lights up the Arctic night like a second sun. The station, the creature, and the threat are consumed in cleansing fire. Your sacrifice ensures the horror never spreads beyond this desolate place.

consequences.worldState: Threat contained but at ultimate cost

endings.title: Against All Odds
endings.description: You escape and call for a military response
endings.narrative: The rescue helicopter arrives just as the storm clears. You've survived, and your evidence convinces the authorities to quarantine the site. The knowledge of what lurks beneath the ice will haunt you forever, but the world is safe.

endings.title: Lost in the Ice
endings.description: The isolation and horror claim your sanity
endings.narrative: The search team finds you days later, catatonic and mumbling about eyes in the dark. Some mysteries are too terrible for the human mind to survive intact. You spend your remaining days in a facility, drawing pictures of things that shouldn't exist.

endings.title: Joining the Research
endings.description: You become part of the station's eternal experiment
endings.narrative: The creature's touch is cold but strangely comforting. As the transformation begins, you understand what the research team discovered. You become the next guardian of ancient secrets, waiting in the ice for the next visitor.

toneProgression.act1: building dread through environmental details and isolation
toneProgression.act2: escalating horror with supernatural elements and direct threats
toneProgression.climax: overwhelming terror balanced with moments of human courage

aiGuidance.playerAgency: Allow creative survival solutions. Reward cautious play but punish excessive passivity. Every choice should feel consequential.
aiGuidance.mechanicsHandling: Describe psychological effects viscerally - 'your hands shake uncontrollably' instead of showing fear numbers. Make the environment feel alive and hostile.

responseToPlayerMood.aggressive: Hasty actions increase danger but may reveal important information
responseToPlayerMood.cautious: Careful approach reduces immediate danger but may increase psychological pressure
responseToPlayerMood.panicked: Fear-driven choices lead to mistakes and escalating terror
responseToPlayerMood.methodical: Scientific approach helps process horror but may expose player to more disturbing truths

encouragedElements: Atmospheric descriptions of cold, isolation, and darkness
Gradual revelation of horror through environmental storytelling
Body horror elements balanced with cosmic dread
Moments of human vulnerability and courage
forbiddenTopics: Graphic gore beyond cosmic horror levels
